results.description: Wolves move into the top half of the Premier League for the first time since the opening weekend, as they beat a disappointing Aston Villa in the West Midlands derby.
results.shortTitle: Wolves beat poor Villa to move eighth
results.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers 2-1 Aston Villa: Wolves win to move into top half

results.description: Dean Smith says his side were second to everything in their 2-1 Premier League defeat by Wolves.
results.shortTitle: Villa were second to everything - Smith
results.title: Wolves 2-1 Aston Villa: Dean Smith says Aston Villa were second to everything

results.description: Nuno Espirito Santo describes his Wolves side's performance as "amazing" after their 2-1 win over Aston Villa, and says he is "proud" of the improvement shown by winger Adama Traore.
results.shortTitle: Nuno praises 'amazing' win for Wolves
results.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers 2-1 Aston Villa: Nuno praises 'amazing' win

results.description: Mark Lawrenson takes on 'The Irishman' star Stephen Graham to make predictions for the latest round of Premier League fixtures.
results.shortTitle: Liverpool to beat Man City and go nine clear?
results.title: Premier League predictions: Lawro vs 'The Irishman' star Stephen Graham

results.description: The unnamed officer is accused of killing former Aston Villa star Dalian Atkinson who was tasered.
results.shortTitle: PC in court charged with footballer's murder
results.title: Dalian Atkinson: Police officer charged with footballer murder

results.description: Fast cars and girls were of equal importance to football in the early career of Dalian Atkinson.
results.shortTitle: The fast life of Dalian Atkinson
results.title: Dalian Atkinson: Living at speed on and off the pitch

results.description: Liverpool will field two different teams in as many days in order to fulfil fixtures in the EFL Cup and Fifa Club World Cup.
results.shortTitle: Liverpool to play twice within 24 hours
results.title: Liverpool Carabao Cup tie with Aston Villa unchanged despite Fifa Club World Cup clash

results.description: Liverpool score two late goals - including a dramatic injury-time winner - to preserve their six-point lead at the top of the Premier League.
results.shortTitle: Leaders Liverpool fight back to down Villa
results.title: Aston Villa 1-2 Liverpool: Reds fight back to down Villa

results.description: Aston Villa manager Dean Smith says "two basic errors" cost his side as they concede two late goals to lose 2-1 against Liverpool.
results.shortTitle: Two basic errors cost us - Smith
results.title: Aston Villa 1-2 Liverpool: Two basic errors cost us - Dean Smith

results.description: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp hails his side's determination as they scored two late goals to beat Aston Villa 2-1.
results.shortTitle: On days like this you have to fight for everything - Klopp
results.title: Aston Villa 1-2 Liverpool: You have to fight for everything - Klopp

results.description: Mark Lawrenson makes his predictions for the latest round of Premier League fixtures.
results.shortTitle: More misery for Silva? Lawro's Premier League predictions
results.title: Premier League predictions: Lawro looks at this weekend's top-flight games

results.description: Aston Villa host Liverpool in the Premier League - follow Final Score and live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Aston Villa v Liverpool
results.title: Aston Villa v Liverpool in the Premier League

results.description: Chelsea beat Watford in the Premier League after Liverpool and Man City win - watch Final Score, listen to BBC Radio 5 Live Sports and extra and follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Ben Foster denied Watford leveller as Chelsea hang on - reaction
results.title: Premier League latest: Man City and Liverpool among those in action after Bournemouth beat Manchester United

results.description: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp says his side will not be able to play their Carabao Cup quarter-final if the game cannot be rearranged to avoid a clash with the Fifa Club World Cup.
results.shortTitle: Reds could be 'unable' to play EFL Cup tie - Klopp
results.title: Liverpool could be 'unable' to play Carabao Cup tie - Jurgen Klopp

results.description: Goals from Anwar El Ghazi and Ahmed Elmohamady see Aston Villa edge past a youthful Wolves side to reach the quarter-finals of the Carabao Cup.
results.shortTitle: Villa edge Wolves to reach last eight
results.title: Aston Villa 2-1 Wolverhampton Wanderers

results.description: Wednesday's Carabao Cup fourth-round ties including Chelsea v Man Utd and Liverpool v Arsenal - watch 5 Live Final Score, listen to radio commentary and follow live text coverage.
results.shortTitle: Liverpool win on penalties in epic, Rashford gives Man Utd victory
results.title: Chelsea v Man Utd & Liverpool v Arsenal - Carabao Cup fourth round latest

results.description: Manchester City complete a routine victory over Aston Villa at Etihad Stadium to cut Liverpool's lead at the top of the Premier League to three points.
results.shortTitle: Man City see off Villa to narrow gap on Reds
results.title: Man City 3-0 Aston Villa: Champions cut Liverpool's lead to three points

results.description: Aston Villa manager Dean Smith has questioned the VAR decision to let David Silva's goal stand in their 3-0 defeat by Manchester City.
results.shortTitle: Smith questions VAR decision for Silva goal
results.title: Manchester City 3-0 Aston Villa: Smith questions VAR decision for Silva goal

results.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola heaps praise on Raheem Sterling, saying the forward "showed us the energy we needed" to beat Aston Villa.
results.shortTitle: Sterling gave Man City energy - Guardiola
results.title: Manchester City 3-0 Aston Villa: Sterling gave us energy - Guardiola

results.description: Uncapped Douglas Luiz is called into the Brazil squad for friendlies with Argentina and South Korea next month, but injured Neymar is not risked.
results.shortTitle: Luiz earns Brazil call, Neymar left out
results.title: Villa's Douglas Luiz earns Brazil call, injured Neymar left out
